ModMetaData.name: Shoebody Bop
ModMetaData.author: nospaces
ModMetaData.description:
Plays the Shoebody Bop whenever pawns are attacking or downed while in water. Check mod options to adjust volume and configure what tiggers the Shoebody.
NEW (2025-07-27): This now plays during psychic rituals! This can be disabled in the mod options.
